Internally dividing point
:::

Internally dividing point is defined as follows:

$$
\begin{align*}
z &= (y-x) \cdot \dfrac{a}{a+b} + x \\[10pt]
&= \dfrac{ay - ax + ax + bx}{a+b} \\[10pt]
&= \dfrac{bx + ay}{a+b}
\end{align*}
$$
